document_data.name: Flying Auxiliary
document_data.mainbody: The '''Flying Auxiliary''' was a squadron of 20 [[horse]]-archers of [[High Dale]], each with a [[pegasus]] mount, who defended the dale in coordination with its local militia and hired mercenary company. They were differentiated from the [[Pegasus Archery Company]], ironically enough, by the fact the mercenaries were only mounted upon [[horse]]s.
document_data.Formation: This military unit was assembled by the [[High Constable]] of High Dale, [[Irreph Mulmar]] in the late 1360's [[DR]]. In their inaugural iteration, they were commanded by a young [[paladin]] named [[Sothinar]].
